isis-termination-point-attributes.interf.Description: Type of adjacency (broadcast or point-to-point) to be established for the interface.

isis-termination-point-attributes.level.Description: Level of an IS-IS node - can be level-1,level-2 or level-all.

isis-termination-point-attributes.is-pas.Description: Indicates whether the interface is in passive mode (IS-IS not running but network is advertised).
